title: My brothers account was suspended and he cant gift me
body: My brothers account was suspended and he cant gift me. Everytime he tries to gift, the game returns him with error and says exchange.malformedRequest. Anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body: Players whose [**accounts are currently suspended**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964) cannot send or receive any gifts.
